# lodash.unescape v4.0.1

The [lodash](https://lodash.com/) method `_.unescape` exported as a [study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards04.src.study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards05.src.study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards12.src.Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:
```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.unescape
```

In study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards04.src.study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards05.src.study.backend.javapractice.solution.lineards12.src.Node.js:
```js
var unescape = require('lodash.unescape');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#unescape) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/4.0.1-npm-packages/lodash.unescape) for more details.
